scripts.prepare:polygon: mustache config/polygon.json src/helpers.template.ts > src/helpers.ts && mustache config/polygon.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:arbRinkeby: mustache config/arbRinkeby.json src/helpers.template.ts > src/helpers.ts && mustache config/arbRinkeby.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:ropsten: mustache config/ropsten.json src/helpers.template.ts > src/helpers.ts && mustache config/ropsten.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
